text: Planet Smoothie is the third largest American chain of smoothie stores serving smoothies. It was founded in 1995 by Martin Sprock in Atlanta, Georgia. It has 125 locations. In June 2015, Quick-Service Restaurant Franchisor Kahala Brands purchased both Planet Smoothie and Tasti D-Lite. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1995 establishments in the United States
title: Planet Smoothie
